q.gettingStarted: What can I do in the Parent Portal?
q.missingStudents: Why is a student missing or incorrect?
q.timezone: Which timezone are session times shown in?

a.login: Open the Parent Portal link from your center, enter your email, and we’ll email you a sign-in link. If you see too many requests, please wait a few minutes and try again.
a.pages: Dashboard, My Students, Sessions, Attendance, My Requests (if your center uses it), Account, and Help.
a.scheduleAttendance: Sessions list the date/time and student name. Times are shown in the portal's displayed timezone. Attendance is recorded by staff after sessions, and notes shown are shared with parents.
a.incorrectInfo: If students, sessions, or times look wrong, please contact your center admin so they can verify your account link and schedule setup.
a.gettingStarted: You can view linked students, upcoming sessions, attendance history, and absence request statuses.
a.missingStudents: Student links are managed by your center. Please contact your center admin for help.
a.timezone: Times are shown in the center's timezone (shown on each page).
a.attendanceStatuses: Attendance is marked by staff after sessions. You may also see a parent-visible note when provided.
a.absenceRequests: Requests can be pending review, approved, declined, or withdrawn. Approval does not cancel or reschedule sessions.
a.troubleshooting: Try refreshing the page. If issues continue, log out and log back in, or contact your center.
